parameters.name: EndTime
parameters.description: The end of the time range to query. The maximum range between StartTime and EndTime is 24 hours.

parameters.name: LoadBalancerId
parameters.description: The ID of the ELB instance.

parameters.name: StartTime
parameters.description: The beginning of the time range to query. Specify the time in the yyyy-MM-ddTHH:mm:ssZ format.
